abilities.desc: A burst of damaging frost slows enemy movement and attack rate in the targeted area.
abilities.name: Crystal Nova

abilities.desc: Encases an enemy unit in ice, prohibiting movement and attack, while dealing damage over time. Lasts 10 seconds on creeps level 6 or lower.
abilities.name: Frostbite

abilities.desc: Gives additional mana regeneration to all friendly units on the map. Allies within a 1200 radius of Crystal Maiden receive 2x the mana regeneration. Crystal Maiden herself receives 4x the bonus.
abilities.name: Arcane Aura

abilities.desc: CHANNELED - Surrounds Crystal Maiden with 100 random icy explosions that slow enemies and deal massive damage. Grants bonus armor while channeling. Lasts 10 seconds.
abilities.name: Freezing Field
